    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = Sum_{j=0..11} (-1)^(j+1)*binomial(3*n+1, 11-j)*(binomial(j+1, 3))^n. - _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 26 2022"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "T[n_, k_]:= T[n, k]= Sum[(-1)^(k-j)*Binomial[3*n+1, k-j+2]*(Binomial[j+1,3])^n, {j, 0, k+2}];",
        "Table[T[n, 9], {n, 30}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 26 2022 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Sage)",
        "@CachedFunction",
        "def T(n, k): return sum( (-1)^(k-j)*binomial(3*n+1, k-j+2)*(binomial(j+1,3))^n for j in (0..k+2) )",
